name: grace (Gabriella439)
description: [项目级] A prompt engineering functional programming language。来源: https://github.com/Gabriella439/grace

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A prompt engineering functional programming language

来源: https://github.com/Gabriella439/grace
语言: Haskell
Stars: 536

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE
README.md
Setup.hs
dependencies
dependencies/.gitkeep
dependencies/grace-ghcjs.nix
dependencies/grace.nix
dependencies/openai.nix
doctest
doctest/Main.hs
examples
examples/bluesky
examples/chaining.ffg
examples/code.ffg
examples/emotion-wheel.ffg
examples/eval.ffg
examples/history.ffg
examples/learn-in-y-minutes.ffg

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Integrated language support for models

  You don't need to install any dependencies or import anything to get started.
  Everything you need is built directly into the language.

  The language provides a built-in `prompt` function for prompting a model:

  ```haskell
  >>> let key = ./openai.key : Key

  >>> prompt{ key, text: "Generate a list of names" }
  "
  Here are 40 varied first names (mixed genders and cultures):

  - Aiden
  - Sofia
  - Mateo
  …
  - Mabel
  - Imani
  - Zane

  Want names filtered by gender, culture, style (modern/vintage), or as full names/surnames?"
  ```

  … a
